author: Staff Reporter
text:
Demanding disbursement of arrears that were not given for the past four years, members of Tamil Nadu Cooperative Housing Unit Employees Federation staged a protest and observed a fast near the Collectorate here on Monday.

Their other demands include providing alternative jobs to excess employees, regularisation of 640 employees, implementing new wage pact, providing unconditional loan of Rs. 2 crore to each of the societies that were sick, implementing medical insurance scheme for employees and strengthening the cooperatives by implementing the recommendations of high-powered committee. They said the salary of Rs. 46 crore was pending for the past four years and demanded immediate disbursal. They wanted pension of Rs. 10,000 a month.
title: ‘Disburse arrears’
